trans-unit.source: Enumerates the types of data pointers passed to speech synthesis events.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os tipos de ponteiros de dados passados para eventos de síntese de fala.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> is used when constructing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> é usado ao construir um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> passed as the `parameterType` argument to the constructor for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> specifies how the `param2` argument of the constructor (which must be a `System.IntPtr`) is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> passado como o `parameterType` argumento para o construtor para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> Especifica como o `param2` argumento do construtor (que deve ser um `System.IntPtr`) é interpretada.

trans-unit.source: The choice of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> is dictated by the type of event being requested, as specified by a member of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: A escolha de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> é determinado pelo tipo de evento que está sendo solicitado, conforme especificado por um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on how use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType>, see documentation for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações detalhadas sobre como usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType>, consulte a documentação para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.EventId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz parte de uma implementação de síntese de fala personalizado herdando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e use-o de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias e cria uma nova matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias a serem passados para o `Speak` método em um mecanismo de síntese subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por encontrado valor de enumeração do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instância é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Speak>, a implementação

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Converte Americanism para Britishisms no texto a ser falado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> event type, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instance is used to create an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite> fornecidos para o suporte de implementação de interfaces o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary> tipo de evento, um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo> instância é usada para criar um evento para a unidade de um medidor de progresso do sintetizador é criado.

trans-unit.source: The parameters on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, including the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> member value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>, are used to log the event generated through the `LogSpeechEvent` method.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros em <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo>, incluindo o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType> retornado pelo valor do membro <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo.ParameterType%2A>, são usadas para registrar o evento gerado por meio de `LogSpeechEvent` método.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Um mecanismo de processamento de fala é chamado com a modificação <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte no momento.

trans-unit.source: Currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte no momento.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is a <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> created using <see langword="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToCoTaskMemUni" /> referencing a <see langword="System.String" /> object; <paramref name="param1" /> may take on any value.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é um <see langword="System.IntPtr" /> criado usando <see langword="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToCoTaskMemUni" /> que referencia um objeto <see langword="System.String" />; <paramref name="param1" /> pode assumir qualquer valor.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is a
trans-unit.target: Indica que o argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é um

trans-unit.source: is a `System.IntPtr` created using `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure`
trans-unit.target: é um `System.IntPtr` criado usando `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure`

trans-unit.source: referencing a Windows Desktop Speech Technology token --a Windows Desktop Speech Technology object representing a resource, such as a voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>); `param1` may take on any value.
trans-unit.target: fazendo referência a uma tecnologia de voz de área de trabalho do Windows token--uma tecnologia de voz de área de trabalho do Windows objeto que representa um recurso, como uma voz (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>); `param1` podem assumir qualquer valor.

trans-unit.source: Currently instances of a managed synthetic speech engines, written using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space, cannot change resources after construction
trans-unit.target: Atualmente instâncias de um mecanismos de fala sintético gerenciados, escritos usando os membros do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> espaço de nome, não é possível alterar os recursos após a construção

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <paramref name="param2" /> argument to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o argumento <paramref name="param2" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SpeechEventInfo" /> é indefinido.

trans-unit.source: Generally, `param1` and `param2` are then ignored.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, `param1` e `param2` , em seguida, são ignorados.

trans-unit.source: However, if <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary>, a progress meter event can be generated `param1` should be an integer containing the length of the current word, and `param2` a `System.IntPtr` referencing an integer containing the offset of the current word.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> é <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId.WordBoundary>, pode ser gerado um evento de andamento de medidor `param1` deve ser um inteiro que contém o comprimento da palavra atual, e `param2` um `System.IntPtr` fazendo referência a um número inteiro que contém o deslocamento do atual Word.
